name: Salaryman Shi
description: Traverse colorful environments, battle strange animals and master the power of your suitcases to... get to work on time? Play as salaryman Takeshi Shi as you hurry to catch the bus to the office!

name: Escape the Living Nebula
description: Turn-based spaceship battles in a tense fight for survival

name: With You
description: With You is a cooperative two-player puzzle-playground. It's a playful space that hopes to inspire couples to connect, communicate, and collaborate.

name: Huckleberry Fields Forever
description: Huckleberry Fields Forever is a co-op mystery action-platformer. Track thieves in scenic real-world locales, run and jump through procedurally generated levels assembled from hundreds of handcrafted challenges, gather clues, interview witnesses, uncover secrets... but can you solve the case in time?

name: Push the Box
description: The game is a puzzle with boxes, will you be able to solve the puzzle.

name: 120 Yen Stories
description: In 120 Yen series, each season has a unique heroine. By using the four seasons of Japan to tell the story of two people meeting and getting along through the keyword "120 yen".

name: World of Towers
description: World of Towers combines puzzles with tower defense. Design your base in order to collect all of the puzzle pieces and destroy your enemies. Create and share your own worlds on the Steam Workshop using the World of Towers World Builder

name: Malyshka
description: From the sunken depths of a quiet lake, your heart pulls you to the surface; a doll awaits your ghostly form on the shore. Who are you? Why are you here? Discover the sleepy town of Tikhiyavoda, its community, and most of all, yourself.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Dead Park - Collector's Edition
description: Can you help three souls escape a deadly amusement park?

name: Gaserb
description: Gaserb contains difficult puzzles that can be solvable by only clever ideas. Challenge the timer bar which can change how the game works and see if you're clever and fast enough to beat it.

name: Bouldeurdache
description: Bouldeurdache is a remake as a tribute to the old Commodore 64 classic game released in 1984. 100 caves on 5 levels available and 2 turbo modes!

name: Combat League
description: A modern take on Speedball; take some Rocket League, add a little World of Tanks, sprinkle some Pro Skater skills, stunts and combos and you have Combat League! Unleash modern combat vehicles, armed with powerful weapons, and roll out onto the field in this arcade elimination soccer mash-up.

name: Runner Rtx
description: RUNNER RTX is a classic runner game with a procedurally generated world but with cinematic graphics.

name: Helm or High Water
description: Helm or High Water is a VR pirate ship combat game with asymmetrical local co-op. Put your sea legs to the test and work together with a friend to control all aspects of the ship from the helm and sails to the cannons and crew.

name: Blacken Slash
description: A tactical RPG where the items define your character. Create powerful builds from an abundance of items as you try to save a corrupted retro computer system. Fight, loot and then ... just one more level.

name: Dodge It! 2
description: JUMP, DODGE, DIE, REPEAT

name: Tiny Witch
description: Tiny Witch, is a little game about managing a minion store, where you must mix the right resources to build the minions needed by the dungeon masters.

name: Chaos Chain
description: Chaos Chain is a dark cyberpunk roleplaying game set in a bleak dystopian future. Assume the role of a desperate dweller of Slade City, a sprawling urban nightmare of grimy asphalt and broken dreams where crime and disorder run rampant. - Stay Alert. Stay Armed. Stay Alive. Don't lose your humanity.

name: Mirrored Soul
description: A turn-based RPG detective story with focus on monster-collecting, exploration, and humor. Negotiate with enemies to recruit them to your party, and fuse your monsters to create new ones.

name: OverWall
description: You and your friends play as four brave engineer pandas in their new improvised role : defender of the Great Wall of China. A game in local coop, can be played by four person. Follow the plans and organise to make your ammunition to repel your countless enemies !

name: Windmills
description: Master your combat techniques and explore a magic world in this combat - focused metroidvania. Help the unreliable narrator complete his story which changes depending on the player's actions.

name: Into the Backrooms
description: Into the Backrooms - Psychological horror in which you will experience the true experience of fear.If you’re not careful and you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas you’ll end up in the Backrooms

name: Conveyance
description: A conveyor-based production and logistics sandbox including smart machines, node based conveyor belts, logic and recipe based item generation and powerful design time construction. Create and connect Miners, Splitters, Factories, Containers, Vaults and more...

name: Skelton Zone Traveler Emergence
description: Help the travelers escape the horrors of the Skelton Zone.

name: Bangman
description: Bangman is a top-down action roguelike in which you have to defeat hordes of bloodthirsty and cute monsters as you travel from world to world.

name: Stand Firm
description: Interesting levels, rich gameplay, and diverse turrets. In the game, you will use your turret to defend against invading enemies.

name: Hunt-or-Haunt
description: Hunt-or-Haunt is a 6 to 12 player online game where two teams, Hunters and Haunts, face-off in pandemonius battles of elimination! As Hunters combine forces to uncover and dispatch their ghostly foes, Haunts use their stealth and trickery to divide and conquer. Eliminate your opponents to win!

name: Grieve
description: This is a single player, action based thirdperson shooter. were the player travels to different openworld type locations to clear out enemy bases and gather intel

name: Sabbuth
description: You've waken up in a strange place not knowing who you are or what your purpose is. A being lays before you emerging from the ground. He offers you an escape, something you can't refuse. Traverse 3 different areas collecting Artifacts to return to this being while avoiding evil forces.

name: Tumblefire
description: Prepare for a good old fashioned heist in this simulated and fully burnable old west world. Burn down walls with torches or use explosives to create shortcuts. Stack coffins and cow skulls to reach higher. Use the world around you to help you in every way you can imagine.

name: Last Gary
description: it's a refreshing third-person overhead shooting game. four chapters, 10 levels in each chapter, total of 40 levels. various of weapons, enemies, BOSS battles make the level challenging. also have various props, trap mechanism. This game lets you feel refreshing and the achievement of success.

name: Last Space Guardian
description: Survive 10 enemy stages! Shoot 'Em Up style, spaceship game, in pixel art and 8-bit retro music! Evolve your shot to the maximum level, use the energy bar for upgrades, and special abilities! Advance each stage by defeating Bosses and enemies to collect new skills, transformations and extra lives!

name: Trapped VR
description: Trapped VR is a VR puzzle game that focuses on how the player interacts with the game world. To win you must solve the puzzles surrounding you to figure out the secret code that unlocks the container doors.

name: Thalamus
description: Thalamus is a First person puzzle and horror Game. You play as Rayan, an average employee that works at a surveillance company, who found out something he shouldn't have. Now with no way out and missing his memory he must team up with a caged mind to complete what he started.

name: Zombie Shotgun Rampage
description: All that's left is you, the endless swarm of zombies, and the beer they stole. Shoot every rotten scoundrel in your path and bring back the coveted drink, which is a pleasure to while away the days of a fading future!

name: Agryos: Recovering Eden
description: AGRYOS: Recovering Eden is a third-person shooter with elements of a bullet hell where you play as Neziha, an adventurer fighting to recover the Branch of Eden from a failed space colony. Destroy hordes of robots with Neziha’s versatile arm cannon as you blast through this fallen AI-created society.

name: Dummy Falls
description: Dummy Falls is a co-op game where you and your teammate tries to overcome various obstacles until the end.

name: Bounce Ball: Neon Party Arcade
description: Bounce Ball: Neon Party Arcade is reimagining a videogame classic: Play virtual table tennis with up to 4 players in a futuristic visual style using new gameplay elements like power ups and randomly generated arenas.

name: Hell's Delivery
description: Hell's Delivery is a platform puzzle game, your objective is to deliver pizza to demons in hell. You can't control the delivery guy, but you have a inventory with helpful tools to place along the way to help him through the depths of hell.

name: The Fox's Drawing World
description: Use your Magic Pen to help the Tiny, Adorable Fox. Let's Join The Fox's Drawing world.

name: Gods of Isekai
description: - Summons mighty heroes that use lethal powers to bind, stun, burn, and poison players. - Select and organise your team's stat allocation to create an incredibly strong and unique raid team comprised of tanking/attacker/wizard roles.

name: Kurukshetra: Ascension
description: Enter the world of Indian mythology in this unique card battler!

name: Haunted Stories
description: Haunted Stories is a captivating mix of horror and thriller. Experience several exciting haunted stories, each telling its own independent storyline. Each playable story contains its own secrets, game mechanics and puzzles to solve.

name: Coins Collector Simulator
description: Taxi driver or policeman, it doesn't matter here, you just have to collect all the coins!

name: BattlefieldCars
description: A shooting game with cars where you can play in split screen local multiplayer or in single player mode .

name: I Am Gangster
description: This is a 2D Multiplicity Deck Building, Turn-Based Card Strategy game. I don't think the gaming industry has seen anything quite like this type of genre before. I am the solo developer and want to create the most fun gangster card game I can think of.

name: Errante
description: This is an experimental project, a sandbox life simulator that gives you the power to suggest how the game should evolve, which features we should focus on, which slice of life to tell and everything you can imagine.

name: Super Shooter
description: Super Shooter is an all-new FPS game where players use an experimental tool to activate unique stage elements, solve puzzles, and propel themselves through the air ("rocket jumping"). In other words, it's a game where you solve all your problems by shooting at them!

name: 100 Days Without Delays
description: In this Match3 game you have to help Lee Milton manage her task to setup a successful new airport - in mere 100 days! Collect three colorful items in a row, upgrade the airport, even help police to solve the crime, and she will become the youngest airport manager in a company’s history!

name: Jetpack Stadium
description: Jetpack Stadium is a hilarious VR sports game that will have you flying around a virtual stadium. Use your head to hit a massive soccer ball into your opponent's goal using two hand-mounted rockets. Duke it out against other players in a soccer-like competition!

name: Obama Maze
description: Obama Maze is a 3D horror experience with the former United States president, Barack Obama. You must navigate through his courses collecting all 7 of his "Obamiums." Collect all 7 in order to leave his maze and continue onto the next until you reach the final course.

name: Dungeon Wizards
description: Dungeon Wizards combines classic Rogue-Lite and colorful Match3 with adventurous Roleplay elements. Venture on your very own journey, collect and combine rare relics with powerful spells and face loads of challenging enemies!

name: Total Catastrophe
description: Total CATastrophe - This is a complete CATastrophe! Someone stole all your food and scattered it throughout the dangerous levels of this hardcore platformer. The enemies thought they had won, but it was not there!

name: Strange Town
description: Strange town is a very fun Multiplayer and local multiplayer role-playing game. You must find who the werewolf is in the morning and at night, you must fight and survive. Of course, hiding is a good option too.

name: Elven Warmaiden
description: An fantasy Auto-battler game in which you command the elven Warmaidens to fend off waves and waves of attack from enemies besieging your capital city

name: Moon Corp. Tower Defense
description: Build your Lunar Defense Company. Defend against invading aliens in this exhilarating Tower Defense and Business Simulator. Accept contracts, hire staff, conduct research, upgrade turrets, expand your office and protect the Moon. Aliens Down, Profits Up!

name: Dimension Quest Pinball
description: Dimension Quest Pinball is a bouncy mini game made to translate Dimension Quest : Altered Fates into a pinball platformer! Make use of numerous characters and powers all in the pursuit of high scores and victory over evil!

name: Bloon Rush
description: Bloon Rush is a multplayer balloon race game with up to 8 players online! The tracks are brutal and you will have to master your racing skills, while leaving bombs for your enemies! Press B to leave a bomb. Press left-click to accelerate. Do nothing to rotate. Have fun!

name: Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning
description: Reds Adventure A Seasons New Beginning is the first game in a trilogy called "Red's Adventure". It is a short and fun little 2D platformer. Red has to collect the chests to break each of the season's curses.

name: Let It Slide
description: Drag to move Cat Mermaid through obstacles and find the legendary Fishburger. Remember: it's not you suffering, it's Cat Mermaid.

name: The Heilwald Loophole
description: The Heilwald Klinikum used to be one of the most renowned medical facilities in Germany. That all changed when that curious loophole appeared...

name: The Hunter of Falkenberg
description: The Hunter of Falkenberg is a 16 bit action RPG inspired by games like "The Witcher" and "Secret of Mana". Experience a memorable story, explore a dark fantasy world, use your sword and magic to hunt wicked monsters, find epic treasures and conquer the hearts of beautiful women.

name: Donut Dodo
description: If a long lost arcade game from 1983 resurfaced today, it would be Donut Dodo - a classic 2D platformer from the golden era, tough as nails and challenging for the whole family! Ready to top the high score table?

name: Fayburrow
description: In a world of fairies, a childhood friend suddenly calls Beatrice back to her old hometown. Yet when she arrives, her friend is mysteriously missing.

name: King of Heroes
description: Follow our hero on his treacherous adventure tackling on a multitude of obstacles and battling strange and scary monsters. A new and interactive strategy game in the making built just for you and your friends!

name: Bylista: Vasna
description: Move through the forest and meet mystical and magical creatures. Make a choice and go to your goal.

name: Cheftastic: Buffet Blast
description: Cheftastic: Buffet Blast is a new exciting top-down arcade shooter! Take back the Isle of Verdura from swarms of mutant vegetables and climb your way to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Lucky Me
description: In a world devoid of originality, where talentless hacks copy your every move, you gotta use their stupidity against them to come out on top. Line up your shots, pull the trigger and survive the bullet storm in this logic-shooter game.

name: RealmLess
description: Unknown reasons cause the world to collapse, and the remaining people restore order. Rebuild civilization in the waste soil and look for the past in the debris. Magic brings a turn for the better, magic brings everything.

name: QuaQua
description: QuaQua (that's Aqua, with a Quack!) is the addictive duck game for you. Catch the falling blocks to build terrain and keep as much water on your island as possible. Beware of falling bombs and heavy rain as the difficulty slowly climbs in this tile-matching arcade puzzle adventure.

name: Yuza
description: Yuza is a gravity game with a story!

name: Across the ocean
description: In this vast sea world, you have to play an adventurer, hold the rudder with both hands, you will cross the ocean, operate as an excellent businessman, get money, there are many risks in the field of the ocean, improve the power of your ship , make yourself stronger.

name: Darxanadon
description: Explore a massive interconnected labyrinth of grottos, castles, and groves in this 2D retro-inspired Action RPG.

name: Boss Beek-Beekeeping Simulator
description: Boss Beek is a beekeeping game that allows you to play the role of a beekeeper! You'll have hours of entertainment building hives with the best parts you can find to house the best queens and make the best honey!

name: Frog Fight
description: 4 Player online party battle game.

name: Madohi Shiroki no Kamikakushi
description: 《雪境迷途遇仙踪》是由日本知名美少女游戏品牌 Lump of Sugar 制作的奇幻恋爱作品。本作由知名画师萌木原文武（代表作《游魂》系列）担当游戏原画与角色设计，由多位业内资深写手共同创作剧本，由知名音乐人新井健史担当音乐制作，主题歌由方糖社当家歌姬Kicco与新锐创作型歌手逢濑晶联袂献唱。

name: Kiospoly
description: Buy land and build the best food kiosks until you form a big monopoly in the neighborhood. Become the best businessman, and bankrupt your friends through an evil capitalist strategy!

name: OS: Memories
description: You were just the owner of an office, but something piqued your curiosity. Understand what happened to Andy by browsing through his most personal archives and memories. OS: Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer.

name: Zombie Good Guy
description: You are the Last Zombie on Earth and You are the Good Guy. The Evil Humans are trying to destroy You. Can You Survive ?

name: Hotel Architect
description:
Step into the chaotic 24/7 lifestyle of a hotel owner as you design and build grand hotels across the globe. Juggle the increasingly elaborate demands of disorderly guests, logistical nightmares and unexpected obstacles in Hotel Architect, the ultimate hotel construction and tycoon management game.

Advance in a career campaign mode, with a variety of objectives to complete, in order to unlock the sandbox mode across each location.

Create your own hotel from scratch or transform a dilapidated plot into a thriving business. Design the layout and hire construction workers to lay the foundations and build different facilities across multiple floors. Building requires careful planning, as it plays out in real-time, so be careful annoy, disturb or remove items your guests are using – or else they might leave a bad review!

name: Dead Gun
description: DEAD GUN is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements. Take control of a soldier of the elite squad Z-800 and go on an operation to clear friendly worlds from enemies in order to save them.

name: Line Strike
description: In Line Strike game, you get the role of the commander of a small army. All you need to do is select the type of troops and install it on the battlefield. The game does not require a quick reaction and microcontrol, only knowledge of the stats of your units and tactical ingenuity.

name: Treasure Temples
description: Puzzle your way through ancient treasure chambers in Antarctica. Floor tiles will crumble away behind you with every step you take, so tread carefully in your search for gold!

name: Spooky Paths
description: In this emotional roguelite horror take control of one of the surviving children and pave your spooky path through tons of the traps. Is not that enough for you? Okay, take more travel companions with you and don't let them fall into the trap!

name: Zoo Seeker
description: Zoo Seeker is a hidden object game set in a fantasy world. Help the cats fix the mess they have caused by traveling to each world and finding the slimes hidden there.

name: Dino Island Adventure
description: Platform and action game set on and island with dinosaurs. Survive the hungry dinosaurs in the dangerous jungle and escape alive from the island.

name: Provisional Detective
description: A first-person mystery solving game, where you try to find out what happened at Syn Archives.

name: Chemistris
description: Chemistris is a tetris-like game based on chemistry equations. Let's play chemistry! Play fire, play water, play every elements in the universe!

name: Defensive War: Sealed Golem
description: Human VS monsters. Protect the castle! Wave-based real-time strategy (RTS). Protect your castle from attacking enemy monsters with warriors, magic, traps and turrets. The Hero and the golem, along with his companions, go looking for the cause of the appearance of monsters in the world.

name: Mori
description: The arcade shoot 'em up where getting angry is just a game mechanic.

name: Shadow Running
description: An evil cube trying to overcome all obstacles

name: Deadly Racing Duel
description: Deadly Racing Duel - in the role of a racer who conquers circuit auto racing, you accept challenge after challenge in order to prove how good a racer you are.

name: Aldebaran Legend
description: In a village located to the south, there is one of the twelve guardians, the warrior of Leo, known for his determination in combat and number of victories. Our hero will be responsible for finding the mystical artifacts, to prevent the kingdom from being bathed in blood and darkness.

name: War In Other Space
description: War In Other Space, Role-playing game, first-person shooter, there are 15 maps in the game, smart enemies with artificial intelligence, cool Science Fiction Weapons and all this in other Space

name: Ducky
description: Help save Ducky's siblings in this fun, adventure platformer. Jump your way through levels full of traps, enemies, and goodies. Flick switches, collect the keys, open the doors and let those siblings out!

name: Adventure of Tuck
description: Play as Tuck in this roguelike game called Adventure of Tuck. Explore different biomes, unlock new abilities, fight different types of monsters, befriend silly characters and last but not least, fight epic bosses.

name: Cardstock
description: Craft a powerful deck and dive into battle against monsters in turn-based combat combined with isometric tile movement. Explore a freshly generated Crypt in every run, ensuring each playthrough will be a unique test of skill!

name: Total Anarchy: Pavilion City
description: Welcome to the late ’90s. Explore the fully open-world of Pavilion City, a former paradise now consumed by corruption and violence. The anarchic hooligans, the devious guerrillas and the far-right legion are all vying for control of the city and everybody seems to want you dead.

name: The Tribe Must Survive
description: The Tribe Must Survive is a tribe-builder with a generous splash of survival and rogue-like. Whatever it takes... The Tribe Must Survive!

name: Craftlings
description: Craftlings is a game about smart building, resource management and developing automated production chains for growth, wealth, and glory.

name: Dragon Evo
description: Dragon Evo is a fantasy themed tactical card game with over 300 different cards to collect. Combine building cards, equipment cards and hero cards with unique abilities with game-changing event cards. Play single player adventures or online in ranked or unranked modes with or without your friends.

name: Counter Chaos
description: Counter Chaos is a simulation game where you work a growing store of your very own. However, your camera doesn't float and everything is done in first-person, without the hassle of helping hands. It's stressful, but at least you're self-employed.

name: Tukki & Champ
description: In Tukki & Champ a chameleon rides a toucan and they compete for food in an asymmetrical local 2-player matchup. Fly strategically as Tukki or aim precisely as Champ to grab more food than your opponent, in a game where you and your adversary move as one.

name: Phantom Zone: Cryptophasia
description: The future is just a toe away, where supernatural phenomena are frequent. Two identical twins, Akihito and Fuyuto Shirahane. They are caught up in a strange phenomenon in Yomori City, a town where various legends swirl around them.

name: Final Stardust
description: Final Stardust is a 2D story driven JRPG that aims to make turn-based battle systems more dynamic and strategic. Use your abilities, create new decks, seal new monsters and go through an anime-like experience!

name: SpongeGlock SquarePants
description: SpongeGlock SquarePants is an FPS game developed by indie game developer Mix Morris, inspired by Nickelodeon’s favorite cartoon series SpongeBob SquarePants in the late 90s. For those who want to download this unique game in Bikini Bottom, you can find the download links of the game in this article

name: Killbot General
description: Satisfying real-time tactics packed in 5-minute battles. Create a customized cause and lead it to glory as its hero Killbot General in the crazy, dynamic story campaign for single-player or co-op. Simple yet deep, controller-friendly, with emphasis on strategy, not micromanagement.

name: Marmalade box
description: Marmalade box - puzzle game. The object of the game is to find and touch 2 or more blocks of the same color. Enjoy over 100 levels. There are also bonuses (crackers, bombs). More blocks can be destroyed with them. An intelligent game that will increase your concentration.

name: Gyelfars
description: Mini turn-based tactics fantasy game.

name: Space Gliders
description: A young engineer on a quest to help their loved ones. Convince your kin to take the effort and explore distant lands.Protect your family, fight for their survival and a better future.Sky is not the limit.

name: Mologa
description: Description: in 1935, the leadership of the USSR decided to build a new reservoir in one of the regions of the republic. Almost all people left villages and towns, but some refused to leave their homes.

name: Haron: The Riverside
description: Explore the Riverside world, where dangerous enemies, mysterious anomalous phenomena and amazing artifacts await you. Make your own way in this unique story, make friends and defeat enemies. Choose your path and find a way out, because it will determine your fate in the end.

name: Blue Fire: Void Maker
description: Blue Fire: Void Maker is a 3D platforming and level creation game. Let your imagination run wild designing hardcore, epic or silly levels and sharing them with others! The possibilities are endless in this FREE spin-off of the highly-rated action adventure game Blue Fire.

name: Tokyo Detectives
description: Detective Game. Murder Investigation. Interrogate witnesses. Rebut with evidence.

name: Mirror Forge
description: Mirror Forge is a first-person psychological survival horror game. Roam between realities of fear, madness & machinery. Solve puzzles, explore an atmospheric world, survive horrifying entities in an immersive storyline where your choices matter.

name: On Your Hands
description: Cast into a hostile alien world, you alone must solve puzzles and fight deadly monsters using the magical abilities on your hands.

name: Winter Grae
description: Interactive FMV thriller Game that puts you inside a conspiracy to hide the truth. Hackers provide you access to deleted videos to explore an occult mystery. Unravel a coverup, look for clues to what happened to Winter Grae. Will you survive to tell the truth?

name: Billy Bumbum: A Cheeky Puzzler
description:
Solve challenging puzzles as a cube with a butt. Flip, push and fart your way through colorful levels as you rescue your adorable friends in need. Fart for freedom!

Use seemingly simple mechanics in surprisingly deep and satisfying ways to rescue your friends in over 250 levels.

name: Roll the Cat
description: Did you ever wake up in the middle of the night because you heard the cat meowing? This game is just about that! Meet a family with five naughty cats and solve puzzles while trying to convince them to sleep.

name: The Islands
description: An open-world survival game. Use your environment to craft items and structures. Physics based with weather and day/night. More than 50 different animals. Combat and non-combat activities fishing.

name: Mechanibot
description: In this tactical rogue-like auto battler, you'll build your unique team of robots and keep them alive as they fight. Battle through waves of enemies as you travel from planet to planet on a mission to fix the sun. Strategize, protect, survive. A Mechanibot's wrench never rests.

name: Fish Story: Gourmet Puzzle
description: The new adventures of Lucian and his friend XO! This time the friends are traveling through mysterious planets in search of delicacies!

name: Regular Factory: Escape Room
description: You don't work in a regular assembly line. In this escape room, you will investigate what is really being manufactured in a secret factory, explore mysterious places and solve puzzles. Will you unravel the truth?

name: Tiny Road Interchanges
description: Create tiny road interchanges as a traffic engineer. Be as creative as possible, simulate the traffic flow and create efficient interchanges.

name: Subject: Relictus
description: Fight bosses and enemies to collect items and survive on the increasingly hostile planet

name: Alien Age
description: Alien Age is a chaotic merging single player game. As an alien, you combine and deliver a variety of resources before hopeful towns crumble to dust. Prime your engine and shine your saucer, towns are eager to see what the future holds… and they won't wait forever.

name: Hell Bound Monsters
description: Hell Bound Monsters is a TPS survivor game where the goal is not to get us an angel of hell. Everyone goes to hell if they do something wrong. Demons come out of hell and suck your soul out. What do you think you deserve to get to heaven?

name: ABC Flappy
description: Learn how to spell and assemble words to unlock prizes. You can trace and colour the letters of the alphabet too. Swoop deeply into this amazing adventure alongside Albert, the eager for knowledge albatross, flying through the many levels to save his silly friends while learning the alphabet.

name: The Exodus
description: Play an old-school 2D RPG in the vein of Skyfall, Last Heroes and Fantasy Heroes!

name: I, W.O.M.A.N.
description: Battle dangerous robots that have been taken over by a malicious alien program. Customize your character, then fight your way to the Bridge, using power-ups and specialized weapons, to reboot the Central Computer before the berserk robots make it to the human passengers aboard the spaceship.

name: Stop the Saturnians!
description: Stop the Saturnians is a shooter inspired by classic arcade games. Dodge enemy fire, destroy procedurally generated alien waves and fight massive bosses. Collect resources in the midst of combat to upgrade your ship or improve Earth's defenses. Protect yourself and the planet both!

name: Meda Avi
description: 不思議なキャラたちが出てくる短編２Dアクションゲーム！ ダメージを与える方法を探して戦うボス戦のゲームとステージ毎に使える能力が増えていくゲームの2本立て！

name: Island Berry
description: Search for treasures, fish, garden and craft, help mysterious locals and fight monsters to find your way home one day.

name: Insect War
description: Insect Wars is a Top Down Shooter genre game that will not leave you indifferent. Show all the rage and agility by destroying all the spiders in your path. In the end, having taken the spider lair, you will have to defend it alone from the invasion of the spider horde.

name: Nebula Invasion
description: Nebula Invasion was designed for those who enjoy the classic type arcade games, a spaceship shooter with great gameplay. Aliens attack many different ways from marching to dive bombing. You have the tools to fight back with a ship that can power-up with double, triple, rapid fire, or plasma cannon.

name: Nuclear Assault
description: Nuclear Assault is a Shoot 'em Up with all the essence of Arcades in the 90s! Equip new cannons, collect different Power-Ups, defeat the 4 Robot Kings and earn new scores! But most importantly... Shoot, shoot and don't stop shooting!

name: Larry the Unlucky: Part 3
description: Help Larry find a cure for his wife and break his curse of unluckiness by solving riddles and puzzles on his adventures around the whole world.

name: Auro the Bunny
description: Auro - The Bunny is a 2D platform game, in which the player will have to go through obstacles in order to catch all the fruits of the levels to win.

name: MelodyVerse
description: Music is your universe. Explore a customizable sandbox universe driven by music. Create beautiful fractal patterns and dazzling lightshows as you navigate this unique, audio-reactive simulation. Play your own music and tweak the visuals as you desire.

name: Jaki's Wacky Adventure
description: Play as Jaki, a clever ninja fox, in this WACKY action-adventure. Explore, Fight, & Craft as you investigate a murder & chase a killer. On your perilous journey, you encounter deadly robots, bugs & beasts. You will always be surprised in this diverse wacky adventure!

name: Infinite Pixel Battles
description: Follow the White Rabbit and enter the matrix of Infinite Pixel Battles!

name: Explosive Snooker
description: A game of dodgeball on a snooker table

name: Pog 6
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Christmas Stories: Yulemen - Collector's Edition
description: A Christmas Calamity Hits Iceland!

name: Babyquick: Adventure of the Moon Dragon
description: Once upon a time, there was a terrible force of evil called "The Fud King." The Fud King fed on the fear, uncertainty and doubt of his people. This story begins shortly before his fall.

name: The Ghost: Task of the Ghost Hunters
description: Always wanted to be a ghost hunter? Then you have come to the right place with The Ghost - Task of the Ghost Hunters. You will experience the job as a ghost hunter up close and have to solve exciting puzzles.

name: Ridle
description: RIDLE is a 2D action game where you run around the stage in all directions.

name: Redshot
description: Quick reflexes and clever strategies are required in REDSHOT, a bullet-time metroidvania where everything is deadly, but you are deadlier. Can you save the royal city from total destruction? ...Can you do it with style?

name: Skull Bullets
description: Skull Bullets is a roguelike game with RPG elements. You are a risen from the dead shooter who is trying to get out of the endless forest with the undead. Upgrade your skills, get new weapons and deal with a whole crowd of enemies. Will you be able to get out? It all depends on you.

name: Rescue Team: Power Eaters
description: Embark on an electrifying adventure to save the world from a robotic menace! As the leader of the Rescue Team, you will guide your courageous crew as it attempts to shut down the Power Eaters before they turn Earth into a huge ball of lightning!

name: Lux Primora
description: Lux Primora is a new take on the classic JRPG formula. Battle and solve puzzles using elemental magic, and summon the power of the Spirits to change your class and customize your playstyle on the fly.

name: Battle Arena Soccer
description: Incredible Arcade Soccer and Football Game.

name: Makis Adventure
description: Makis Adventure is an Action- Platformer with shark demons. Fight, dash, swim and bite your way through 3 different dungeons. Let the inner shark out! Face many different opponents and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Steampunk Abyss
description: Blast your way through this Bullet Hell Rougelite. Fight the automatons that guard The Abyss. Smash the wreckage for scrap to barter with the citizens of Duc Pointe. Use the experience you have gained to climb closer to the surface with each run. Your experience and a few weapons of your design....

name: The Healer
description: Can you get zero kills? It's a different experience than many other Action / Rogue-Lites. You won't fight the monsters to kill them but to cure their corruption! It's all your big sister's fault and only one who can fix this mess is you!

name: Deep Russian Depression
description: “Deep Russian Depression” is a visual novel about people whose fate is a miserable, dreary and hopeless existence somewhere in post-Soviet Russia.

name: Labyrinth of the Demon King
description: Venture through the Labyrinth Of The Demon King, solving puzzles and fighting fearsome monsters in an epic quest to track down the demon who betrayed your lord and end it’s life.

name: Histera
description: Histera is a free-to-play, rapid-fire multiplayer shooter featuring dynamic deathmatch arenas that transform as you fight! Histera propels the FPS genre into the future with our ‘Glitch’ mechanic that procedurally re-generates maps during matches, delivering unpredictable, feverish combat.

name: Is it you?
description: Give it a go for a thrilling hunch-game with players all over the world! It has various interesting draws that you can enjoy with your acquaintances.

name: Sword of Shadow: Revolution
description: Sword of Shadow: Revolution is an open-world role-playing game. the actions of which take place in the universe of the gods and any mistake can lead to the death of the whole world.

name: Moto Roller
description: Moto Roller is an arcade motorcycle racing game. You ride a fast motorcycle through a city filled with cars or along a narrow highway.

name: Gosh A Ghost
description: Gosh A Ghost is a multiplayer turn-based strategy roguelite with RPG elements. Players hunt ghosts in a haunted mansion to eliminate all the ghosts and win the game.

name: Arizona Derby 2
description: Thrilling, action-packed, racing game. Drive the world's top tuners through locations that are hidden gems across the globe. Ascend the leaderboards, race against the gangs and their allies. Tune the car into endless customizations and show up to the world. Hit the pedal, heat out the offroads!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic
description: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic is a reimagining of the 3D Platformer but told through a unique, pinball format. End the witch’s wicked schemes and conquer her many challenges. Prove once and for all, that you are the true pinball champion!

name: Photoq
description: Hi, I'm Joseph Karras. I'm a photojournalist specializing in documenting paranormal activities. The church sent me here to this house to collect evidence from a supposed ghost that resides here.

name: Tenebrae
description: A cryptic message takes the young vampire to Tenebrae nightclub, where seven incarnations of deadly sins will stand in her way. Now she has to survive among intrigues and solve the mystery of her mother's disappearance. Which circle will you choose, Beatrice?

name: Goose vs. Zombies
description: Wake up, Goose, your village is invaded by zombies. Solve puzzles, open paths for exploration, defeat enemies. Hooonk!

name: King of the Universe
description: Help the kingdom of Kish conquer all of ancient Mesopotamia in this historical realtime strategy game. Fight all other empires in the region to earn the ancient title of Lugal Kiški: King of the Universe.

name: Social Services of the Doomed
description: With all the supernatural feuds you mediate, from vampires to trolls, your city job should be paying you more. And Hell's got a great offer for your soul.

name: Ember Crusade IV
description: Ember Crusade IV is a twin stick looter shooter roguelike where you embark on a blazing crusade to save the solar system from a demonic invasion.

name: Chronicles of Deeps
description: Chronicles of Deeps is Sci-fi FPS where you need to control submarines to get through story. In 2070, an event happened which left the whole world under the ocean. People separated on fractions and started to fight for resources. In 2112, some things happened which you should discover in this game.

name: Teasing Master Takagi-san VR: 2nd Semester
description: Virtually experience the playful and relentless teasing of heroine, Takagi-san, in Teasing Master Takagi-san VR: 2nd Semester. Go heads up in poker with Takagi-san, go fishing together, and more!

name: Outbraking
description: Outbraking is a PvPvE Co-Op Racing Game, in which you and your team can take on different missions in a vivid city to earn money and views, becoming the most viewed Outbraker!

name: Time Flipper
description: Press one button to switch between timelines, this is your time-flip device, use it to find the missing people and convince them to follow you. Lead them out by switching the world state. Enemies will attack you but you carry no weapons, escape the violence by switching between timelines.

name: Metroplex Zero
description: Cyberpunk party-based strategic card battle RPG. Assemble a team that fits your playstyle to take on evil mega corporations. Customize your decks and choose your cards wisely to defeat tough foes. Power up your heroes with gear, augments, cards, and level ups.

name: Cradle of Souls
description: After winning the war, Alastria is enjoying peace, but not the King. His wife is sick with a dangerous disease. In charge of finding an antidote is Orlando, the veteran Crusader, and Saigo, the Demon Hunter. What will happen as consequences of this mission and it's outcome will change everything...

name: Mandala
description: Mandala is a hypnotic and and meditative bullet hell shooter. Let the flow inspire you while coloring geometric figures and discover more about yourself through immersive moods.

name: September 28 Pizza
description: On this top down shooter game, put yourself in Chad Jones' shoes by delivering pizza as a zombie apocalypse unfolds!

name: Steps From Above
description: Survival Experience and a capturing story

name: Marrakech
description: There is a doctor possessed by demons inside Marrakech hospital, he is invoking evil creatures. Pacientes inside need your help. Use a blessed Ak and defeat the creatures that comes your way.

name: Eco Park
description: Eco Park is a game about ecology and lo-fi hip-hop. Manage a dynamic ecosystem with creatures eating, breeding, and dying in real time. You’ll need to introduce species to increase biodiversity. Keep population sizes under control, or one species might extinguish another.

name: Limita Luminii
description: Joc narativ în realitate virtuală. Marcat în copilărie de trauma Primului Război Mondial, un pictor român trăiește în 1939 panica începerii unei noi tragedii, clacând treptat și evadând în spațiul abstract al propriei arte.

name: Gladiatori
description: Single player arena survivor. Earn ranks as you overcome your enemies to reach the top. Each enemy you kill is a step closer to your goal. Choose to spare or execute your foes as the rounds continue. For eternal glory, your rank is projected on the world stage.

name: Neverspring Chronicles
description: Hunt down fading magics to customize your combat abilities and explore a world on the edge of death and rebirth as you navigate a dynamic narrative toward multiple endings in this old school 90's style JRPG.

name: Laypo Simulator
description: 'Laypo Simulator' includes multiple different game modes. At the moment they include: Laypo Country Simulator and Laypo Apocalypse Survival.

name: Putty Putter
description: A grid-based movement golf game where you control a putty-like creature with the unique ability to expand and form different shapes. Do you have what it takes to stretch your brain power to the limit and conquer all mind-bending puzzles on offer?

name: Fall Up
description: Take a leap into a lost world of mechanical wonders and embark on a hopping adventure with our adorable Labi! You need to traverse this cartoonish world with a variety of jumps and moves, meet squishy creatures and clumsy robots and reveal the secrets of this world.

name: Global Steel
description: Global Steel is a 2d run-and-gun video game inspired by Saturday-morning cartoons from the 80s.

name: Sporty Games
description: Fun and sport from your home! Your body is the controller, move to play alone or with friends!

name: Acid Trip
description: Acid Trip is a 2d top-down shooter you can play it with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay, and Back-Breaking, Challenging Gameplay defeat bosses, zombies, and don't die from shredders, traps to make it more hellish and brutal. it's like if doom was 2d.

name: Wood Brothers Flying Colours
description: Flying Colours is an arena-based multiplayer dogfighting game for VR. The game features a highly realistic aerodynamic and physics-based flight model and some of the most exhilarating, chaotic, and hilarious air battles you can experience with your headset.

name: Shadow of the Guild
description: Combine your lightning spells, assassin skills, and warrior power to defeat your enemies in a 2D platformer / beat'm all! And prevent Emperor Gethro III from carrying out his project! Based on the french books "La Guilde des Marchands de Pluie"

name: End of Lines
description: Travel across landscapes devastated by a catastrophic climate meltdown, following a small family in search of somewhere habitable. With limited supplies and facing potential death at every turn, your choices will decide their fate. Will they manage to settle down?

name: Road Mayhem
description: Road Mayhem - A driving adventure for all fans of the racing genre! Get behind the wheel of your car and go on a trip along the highways. There is only you, an endlessly long road and crowds of enemies who will try to lead you astray ...

name: Back Alley Inn
description:
You’ve managed to secure a spot for your new Inn. It might be the shady part of town but at least there are no annoying guards checking up on you.

Manage your Inn by building rooms to serve and explore the patrons' various needs and interests. Hire employees to serve, cook, plant, clean, and much more.

Hire Adventurers to explore dungeons and gather interesting ingredients for your next exotic recipe. The patrons need not know what's in that stew.

Build training rooms for your Adventurers to improve their skills and equip them with runes enchanted to resist the various negative effects of the dungeon monsters.

name: Puzzle Battler! Mirai
description: "Puzzle Battler! Mirai" is a fun 4-match Puzzle RPG with a variety of skills to attack and defend. Chain the puzzle pieces to defeat the enemies, get funny skills and challenge the bosses!

name: Totally Convenient
description: A brain-melting multi-tasking eye-hand coordination game. Use all kinds of weird machines and react quickly to throw delicious food to demanding customers! Playable with only 4 buttons in more than 75 levels : That's totally convenient!

name: Ragdolls Playground: The Sandbox
description: Ragdolls Playground is a simple Physics Sandbox game where you can Build, Paint, Destroy, Drive cars, Simulate Wars or crush ragdolls in a large open space and watch them fight with the wobbliest physics system. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

name: Quest of Wizard
description: Quest of Wizard is a classic Action Platformer set in a fantasy setting. Go through difficult levels full of dangerous traps and different enemies, fight with bosses, look for chests with gold, open secrets, learn and upgrade spells.

name: Casual Pixel Warrior
description: Survive the waves! Buy weapons and ammo! Unlock new stages! Purchase companions! Solve daily quests and get rewards! Casual Pixel Warrior is a wave shooter where your endurance to last an infinite fight depends on your skill, unlocked weapons and purchased ammo.

name: Wonderbirds
description: Meet new Lemmings that meets Xonix. Escort dozens of nestlings to save them from the global flood and furious predators. Use your magic wisely and carefully. Coop with your friends and family to have more fun.

name: Object Ward.
description: Object Ward is a visual novel about the various misadventures of a man who sees everyone with an inanimate object for a head. What is real, and what is a hallucination?

name: Trail Out
description: Welcome to the Trail Out festival! Reckless races in different parts of the planet await you! Explosions of cars, shouts of departing drivers, hype from fans, all this awaits you here!

name: Dino Cub
description: Dino Cub is a fun and relaxing puzzle game, you have to build the correct path to prevent the dinosaur egg from breaking as the level progresses.

name: NanoMachina
description: Challenging retro twin-stick shooter inspired by old ZX Spectrum games. Defeat all bosses and earn special power-ups before your lives run out.

name: Orrb
description: orrb is a path building puzzle game where you explore & experiment by placing tiles. Discover different tiles, how they behave, and how you can use them to send the Orrb on its way.

name: Mello
description: Hop, jump, and stick your way through a forest under threat to save your friends and family from the evil Flame Beast and his Embers.

name: WshWsha
description: Break free from the system by taking it on in a series of frantic, fast-paced, action-packed platforming challenges.

name: Bavity
description: Bavity, A fast paced puzzle game with balls and gravity. Any group of 3 or more balls can be double clicked out of existence. Stop your screen from filling up, Its that simple.

name: The Hike
description: The Hike is a first person horror/puzzle game in which you must push through the horrors that start in the much feared forests of the Mount Grandious National Park. Use your skills to make it back to society... and use your legs, you're no fighter.

name: Bone's Cafe
description: Bone's café is a fast paced cooking game. Customize the layout of your kitchen to guarantee your success. Specialize your menu in ingredients and recipes to design your ultimate restaurant. Raise your customers from the dead, or invite your friends in this 4 player cooking adventure.

name: Wreckdigger
description: Dive into a short story about stranded rebel fighting for his survival on a foreign mysterious planet which is a spaceship graveyard. Encounter scavengers fighting for valuable ship parts. Meet other survivors -help others to help yourself. An action platformer with metroidvania elements.

name: Restaurant Solitaire Delicious Lunch
description: Cook a delicious lunch and enjoy it! 200 levels with a romantic lunch theme!

name: Oddware
description: Oddware is a science fiction visual novel about androids in space. You play as an android who meets other androids each with a distinct personalities. Your choices with the other androids will not only shape their personalities, but your own as well. Solve puzzles, mysteries, and your own origins.

name: TrapBot
description: TrapBot is a dynamic 2D action hardcore platformer in an urban style

name: Yingzinue: Donghei
description: Yinznüe: donhei (original project code: the rest of life) is a round role-playing game independently developed by the independent game author Dai frog, with the revival of Hanfu as the main theme.

name: Fairground Power Polyp Simulator
description: Always dreamed to be the operator of your favorite fairground ride? This is your change to take the control! Our Polyp Simulator will let you operate the ride completely yourself in a realistic way.

name: Fast Finger Rule
description: Fast Finger Rule is a minimalistic battle planet duel simulator. To make precise shots you just need to click on your planet at right time. Game has 10+ planet shield types and 15+ planets of 3 different tiers.

name: Planetary Deliver
description: If you want to learn about cities, countries and geography overall but in a fun and soothing way you should jump aboard the Planetary Deliver! Your job is to transport different packages around the world and build your own plane! You can play alone or with your friends.

name: Crazy Fatties
description: Crazy Fatties is also crazy and cute Fat Brother designed the inspired game. It's a casual game of choice. Waiting for the levels of many games, the fat guys are happier to communicate together.

name: Kismet Tapestry
description: A first-person, 2.5D singleplayer RPG set in space in the distant future, the player controls various members of the crew of the Federation of Frontier Colonies' Dirac Space Station as an intergalactic conspiracy unfolds.

name: Miskatonic
description: Miskatonic is a fantastical VR shooter game. The game will transport the player visually, as well as through their senses, while also navigating a meaningful narrative of the magical world of Miskatonic University.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Home Sweet Home - Back from Vacation
description: 1001 Jigsaw. Home Sweet Home: Back from Vacation is an exciting puzzle game and vivid memories from vacation in 500 high-quality photos.

name: Peculiar Tales of Mid-Lake Pavilion
description: On a sultry night in late August, I ran into a man carrying a peony lantern at the Mid-Lake Pavilion. In the hazy and dim light, the man told the odd and bizarre stories. Under the overcast rainy sky, the moon setting horizontally, you will be brought into a perplexing, weird, and supernatural world

name: Project: Halloween
description: She was created for one purpose: to make sure everyone in the world enjoys Halloween. At all costs. A short, fully-voiced horror visual novel exploring instrumental convergence.

name: Coins Invaders
description: Save Bitcoin from this currency madness by destroying altcoins while the Fed keeps us in this currency issuance currency madness

name: TouHou Music Recording
description: Another incident hit Gensokyo,in totally SILENCE. This time, Hieda no Akyuu- the girl buried in Gensokyo Chronicles, now was pulled up to fix the history on her own! "TouHou Music Recording" is dedicated to all Touhou Music lovers. Be prepared to start a bizarre journey with Akuu right now.

name: Hen in the Foxhouse
description: A short, silly, top down shooter filled with chicken demolition.

name: Fae Populi
description: Fae Populi is a JRPG with horror and mystery elements about a little fae who faces her demons to protect her new friend from a terrible fate.

name: Radiotelegraphist
description: Radiotelegraphist is a game with static scene and action. Communicate with other stations by using morse code. Break code "Dielegat" from 1919.

name: Holiday Jigsaw: Thanksgiving Day 2
description: Gobble-gobble! 500 high-quality photos! 500 ideas for a happy family harvest holiday in Holiday Jigsaw Thanksgiving Day 2!

name: Pen Pal Princess
description: Pen Pal Princess is a queer romcom visual novel about long distance relationships and online dating. Correspond with potential suitors through letter writing, email, and DMs to convince them to rescue you from your secluded princess tower!

name: Cold Verdict
description: Five strangers wake up in a dark room in an abandoned building with no idea who put them there and why. They now need to work together in order to figure out what connects them and how to get out of this place. A short psychological thriller visual novel with choices.

name: Block Line Engineer
description: Block Line Engineer is a physics based sandbox machine building simulation game where you are challenged to create block lines that are as efficient as possible.

name: The Thing from Nowhere
description: Travel to a remote town in Alaska and uncover the truth behind reported sightings of a mythical creature from ancient Inuit folklore. A Choose Your Own Adventure mystery set in the 1950s, inspired by classic monster movies and Amiga's "It Came from the Desert".

name: Spiritfall
description: Spiritfall is a fast-paced Action Roguelite inspired by Platform Fighters. Battle against a multitude of enemies using an ever-changing arsenal of divine powers.

name: Steel Ball Race
description: Win the race, and upgrade your spirit!

name: Drone Simulator
description: Pilot a wide range of drones through varied environments in this exciting and challenging simulation game.

name: Chaos Uproar
description: Chaos Uproar is an FPS Single player game. An Action and Adventure packed dark atmospheric game with only basic moves and shooting skills. Analyze your enemies and plan you own move to defeat them. Powered with AI and horror ambience, this game will drip the sweat out your forehead.

name: Mysteria of the World: The Forest of Death
description: A visual novel that immerses the reader in a fantastic and frightening world. Will you be able to return home, avoiding all the dangers?

name: Mother Stone
description: Take the role of Agent Blair as she fights her way through Zombies, Cultists and Giant Snakes to uncover the truth about the Mother Stone. Battle challenging bosses, Collect useful power-ups to give Agent Blair an edge over the unknown monsters that plague The Thurston House.

name: Slidetracked
description: Slidetracked is a friendly minimalist puzzle game with a unique movement mechanic.

name: Brave Tales
description: Brave Tales is an isometric action metroidvania where you explore the vast world of Slavic mythology and your story decisions can alter your world and reshape your destiny. You play as Ivan, who is the only one to save the village from the pure evil.

name: Lawnmower Game: Space Fight
description: Epic Lawnmower game series continue now at space. Now you control super powered lawnmower space ship and fight against enemies at different space levels.

name: Find the heart
description: There are sixteen hearts hidden in sixteen worlds. They are so hidden that they can hardly be found. But if you collect all the energy balls of a world, you will get a hint when you pass. Even so, to find them, you still need to have extraordinary ideas and precise operations. Can you succeed?

name: Fall of Kings
description: Fall of Kings is the new representative of roguelike strategy deck building games. In a medieval Europe on the brink of chaos, play as a mighty king and use intrigue or force to triumph over your opponents.

name: Princess Sera Adventures
description: Princess Sera adventures - In this platformer, you take on the role of a naughty, sweet tooth princess. Her passion for sweets is so great that she escapes from the palace just to collect as much ice cream and peanut butter as possible. But be careful!

name: Village of Zombies
description: In Village of Zombies you can fight against zombies and mutants together with other players or alone on different maps, the goal is to survive as many levels as possible. The game always starts at level 1 and with each level increase, more zombies and stronger zombies come.

name: Fantasy Gardens
description: This is a relaxed plant simulation game. The adjustment parameters can simulate the ever-changing plant growth state. Players can design their fantasy gardens with imagination and creativity.

name: Nuke Land
description: Nuke Land is a post-apocalyptic land that survived a nuclear war. The open world and freedom of action are all in your hands! Rob the Scrooge or become a caravan driver. Save "Rusty" or take over the gang. Explore, travel, take risks, eventually open a casino in Bordelo.

name: Priest Simulator: Heavy Duty
description: Sandbox with a vampire priest in the leading role. Destroy shatanists and turn the devil's village into an oasis of christianism.

name: Mearstale our little item shop
description: "Mearstale" is a national strategy adventure game where you become the lord of the country and develop the town significantly. Sell ​​everything from stones to real estate, build buildings, and sometimes interact with people to explore the world within a given period of time.

name: Aurora's Journey and the Pitiful Lackey
description: Join Aurora and the Lackey in this side-scrolling game with shooter mechanics, adventures, various mini-games and 3D graphics. In 1927, Aurora, a young astronomer, receives the journal of her father who disappeared four years earlier and embarks on a journey to find him.

name: Touhou Multi Scroll Shooting 2
description: A derivative work of Touhou project. Featuring dynamic camera. Blend from side scroll shooting and top-down shooting seamlessly.

name: Banzai Bat
description: Banzai Bat is an action-packed local multiplayer game for 2-4 players filled with different skins, stages and modes. Easy to learn, hard to master. Charge up your baseball bats and make your friends fly!

name: Hunkenstein
description: The most fearsome monsters of classic cinema are now common household pests. You're the new exterminator in town. Unlicensed, of course. Shoot, crush, burn, or mulch these physics-based ghouls, then collect the check.

name: RedShip
description: Match colors to build your own spaceship! Explore space and fight alien spacecrafts while acquiring weapons and upgrading your red ship. Become the space pilot you’ve always wanted to be.

name: Minesweeper NG
description: Enjoy this variant of the classical puzzle game 'Minesweeper'. You guide a beautiful heroine through a mine field. One wrong step and your character is blasted to smithereens. Your goal is to reach the magic statue that teleports you to the next level.

name: Sacred Curse
description: After awakening from a deathlike dream, Charlotte's life turned into a terrible tale.

name: Bric à Brac
description: Over 50 hidden object scenes. No cooldown but limited hints available.

name: The Wolf Is Dead
description: Detective work is never easy. When the body of Alexander Wolff is found face down in the pool at a party for the film about his life, there's only one man (well, Fox) for the job. Interrogate suspects, investigate the scene of the crime and reach back in time with your partner, Maxwell Mirror.

name: TileHunter
description: Your goal is to complete all the dungeons without dying and also to complete all the quests and objectives on your way.

name: Stationery Frontier
description: Stationery Frontier is a game that brought your childhood imagination to life. Fly around, dogfight, Pew & POW with your ruler-pen fighter!

name: Jingor Sudoku
description: Jingor Sudoku is to fill the number between 1 and 8 in Jingor face with some numbers in accordance with the following rules into the blank nine grid except the middle grid. rule: each number from 1 to 8 can only appear once on each side or edge. The answer to each Jingor Sudoku is unique

name: Nanny
description: Evil nanny has you locked in her house, but you've discovered a way to break free from her. You have just 7 days to do that.

name: Interconnected Stories
description: Decide the fate of our friendly characters through dozens of cards. It's up to you to make their dreams come true or provoke unpredictable stories!

name: Cult of Cards
description: Cult of Cards is a co-op horror card game for 1-4 players. An evil cult tries to unleash an ancient demon and all that stands between them and the apocalypse is you, your friends and a deck of cards.

name: League Manager 2022
description: Let's be the manager of the E-Sports club! Choose your favorite team and recruit your favorite players. Train them and choose a tactic that suits the personality of the team member and opponent. Make your favorite team win and make it the most prestigious club.

name: Devorian: Left Behind
description: Episodic adventure set in a post apocalyptic steampunk world. Explore shattered mechanical islands as Amber, a young engineer, with Monty, her animal companion - struggling to survive in the harsh air filled with soot and smoke, while their village is the only place where life lives on. For now.

name: ZPlague
description: Armed militaries are requested to clean an area infested by zombies. On each round you don't now if you will be a zombie or a soldier, so use the skills or items that was given to you and keep alert.

name: SpaceGaze
description: SpaceGaze is a space arena shooter in which you have to destroy hordes of space invaders from another universe.

name: Nonograms 22
description: A jam packed nonograms game with beautiful pixel art and a slick UI. Over 216 puzzles to solve, achievements and a relaxing audio soundtrack wrapped up in 20+ hours of gameplay!

name: Freedom's Eye
description: You have found yourself within this god forsaken prison. The people around you don't seem human... They don't look good or trustworthy... But you share the same goal ,Freedom.

name: Ping Pong Pufferfish
description: Aim precisely to get into the glass jar. Ping Pong Puffership is a challenging puzzle game in which you toss a ball until it hits the jar. The fewer balls you use, the more points you get!

name: CatNab
description: The cat's outta the bag! That's why we're bringing a barrel. Compete for high scores by nabbing as many cats as you can.

name: Icewall
description: Icewall is a game that combines retro shoot'em up and modern roguelite game design. It features intense, colorful and fast-paced gameplay, the roguelite run-based structure enhances the game with strategy and replay-value as you draft new strategies and combos.

name: Humankind in a nutshell
description: Humankind in a nutshell is a 4X strategy game based on slot mechanisms. Beginning from the Ancient era, you have to feed your tribe and fight against barbarians, study new technology to develop your nation. Build various types of facilities which will help your nation grow to achieve victory.

name: Black Room
description: Black Room is a first-person psychological horror game focused on story and experience. What starts as a night in a motel will pull you deep within the human psyche, leaving you grasping for an exit – and not only for yourself.

name: The Elevator Game with Catgirls
description: Kirin plays the elevator game and disappears. Will her girlfriend, Asahi, be able to find her? The Elevator Game with Catgirls is a horror visual novel with point-and-click elements, inspired by the Korean urban legend, Elevator to Another World.

name: Only Society: Arena
description: Only Society Arena is a new MOBA game which players can spend their time with family and friends. Players will play in a third person view with choosing either in team ranger or team rogue to defend each base.

name: Castle of Secrets
description: The Castle with Secrets - a game with a deep and mysterious storyline, beautiful 3D graphics, unique gameplay and mechanics, will immerse you in a fairy tale of reality and mystery. How will this fairy tale end? It's your call.

name: Kombo King
description: In this Kung Fu beat em' up, you will unleash powerful combos and destructive finishing moves! You are a rogue warrior who vows to avenge his brethren from the Sunless.

name: Employee A
description: Employee A is a pixel art point-and-click adventure set in the heart of the modern-day high technology industry. Inspired by classic mystery game series like Ace Attorney and Zero Escape, Employee A will test your logic and deduction skills as you investigate the murder mystery that's upturned your life.

name: Spikair Volleyball
description: Control the 4 players of your volleyball team. Recruit players, train them and win tournament to become the best volleyball club.

name: Snake Pit
description: "Snake Pit" is a Puzzle Game with a simple but incredibly Fun Gameplay. Help the little Caveman escape the Snakes and defeat Medusa.

name: Wall to Wall
description: Wall to Wall is an arcade scoring game.

name: Polygon of Reality
description: Being in complete darkness, a person involuntarily comprehends the thought of whether he is alone in it? Penetrate into another dimension with your secrets and meanings, monsters and monsters. After passing here please don't stop otherwise you will stay here forever

name: Elemental Battlefields
description: Fight solo or team up with friends in this action-packed magic fighting game! To earn diamonds and shards, use your magic and level up! You can also find them around the map in Drop Zones and buy them in the in-game shop. Spend them on learning any new element you choose!

name: Ten: Ten Rooms, Ten Seconds
description: TEN is a challenging and brutal platformer in which you face a relentless gauntlet of ten-second deathtrap rooms in a desperate struggle to escape your fate... and find out what the hell is going on around here.

name: Maken-shi Sara
description: One day, Kurose Sara, the leader of the Magic Research Club, runs into Amy the devil and acquires the ability to transform into "Maken-shi", a warrior that fights evil! In order to stop the devils, Maken-shi Sara heads to the dungeons filled with evil beings!

name: Elements of Dreams
description: Elements of Dreams is pixel art action role playing game (much like the original Legend of Zelda). Play as the heroine who must discover four unique powers in order to defeat her nightmares and find her purpose.

name: The Search for MR Fimple
description: You can talk with people and go on Quests , Collect GLORBS , Drive a Car , Fly a Helicopter , Try a "Challenge" and much more !

name: Pushy Worm
description: Help daddy worm as he embarks on a puzzle filled adventure to gather fruit for his hungry little family. Solve puzzles using grid-based Sokoban movement, climb fences, balance items on your head, avoid falling on to spikes, do whatever it takes to collect all the fruit and keep those kids happy.

name: Pet idle
description: Pet Idle is a simulation game where you can take care of various virtual animals! Build and manage your home to be a cozy home for many pets!

name: Destructure: Among Debris
description: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris is an intense mix of brick breaker, air hockey and bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic world. Destroy structures, dodge bullets, fire guns and buy perks to lay even more waste!

name: Soul Climb
description: Easy to learn, hard to master. Overcome your limits in this tight precision platformer with quick respawns. Jump from walls, avoid deadly traps and time your movements perfectly so you can climb out of the deep cave you fell into. It’s all about not giving up!

name: Koru
description: Play as aspiring botanist, Koru, on her journey to Wilder County to start an apprenticeship with the illusive Dr. Linny.

name: Survive Lviv
description: Survive Lviv is an old school FPS where you need to survive a horde of Soviet robots, ghouls, and wizards in order to eliminate the Soviet overlord. The game takes place in a post nuclear Ukraine in the year 1991.

name: Hidden Town
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Our Mother's house
description: Our mother`s house is a survival, exploration, puzzle horror game with randomly generated events. Try to survive the night by using different items and exploring your mother`s childhood house. But be careful as many shadows and monster are lurking in the darkness...

name: Scientifically Accurate Dinosaur Mating Simulator 2021
description: It's just another day in the life of a dinosaur college student at Heck Creek University.

name: DeathOmen
description: DeathOmen is a psychological horror game in first person, in which you'll have to spend a few nights in a house that hides mysteries and fears that you didn't know, or didn't remember they existed!

name: Songs of Glimmerwick
description: Become immersed in a musical woodland fantasy world where casting a spell is as easy as playing a song. Attend classes, grow the university garden, make friends with classmates and townsfolk, and explore the island’s many oddities and mysteries in this story-driven witch academy RPG.

1919. Saboteurs organised an insolent provocation in revolutionary Novgorod. So called «miracle-making» relics of Saint Lukian were stolen right on the eve of being exposed and debunked in public. Our paper «The Red Case» is following the investigation.

name: 7 Days to Save the World
description: This game is a political simulator..... but also : a jump and run, platformer, puzzle game, horror game, RPG, top down shooter and exploration game. 7 DTSTW is a 7 part simulation where you can rule a country and explore many hidden secrets. This simulation has many surprises in store for you!

name: Floor is Lava
description: My Floor is Lava is an action platformer with puzzle elements in which you have to help a little inhabitant of a deep cave, which is being swallowed by lava

name: Layerworld
description: Solve each level, layer by layer, as the ghosts of your deaths stack up.

name: Army to Army
description: Army To Army is a strategy game with physics and mountains of non-disappearing victims. In the game, you can collide with each other from 2 to 4 armies, in total on the map there can be more than 500 fighting different classes and characteristics.

name: Hidden Histories: The Principality
description: Over sixty hidden object scenes themed around a fictional European country. 100% hidden objects, no narrative story, no adventure, no puzzles, just objects to find.

name: Crypto Tycoon
description: Ever wanted to manage & build your own crypto empire? Trade crypto and invest into new properties to expand your business.

name: The Cow Game
description: The Cow Game is a Singleplayer 3D Adventure about a caring mother cow that tries to find her stolen calf in a small Low Poly world. While you are following your calf's voice, you find out about a secret cult and experience strange happenings. Can you save your calf? Your child is waiting for you.

name: Clarent Saga: Chronicles
description: A novel with great RPG turn based battles. A great entry point for newcomers!

name: Hunt Souleater
description: Hunt Souleater is a PvPvE third-person shooter that 60 players are devided into hunter and souleater camps. Hunters besiege the Stramon Island where souleaters haunt to kill the souleaters and destroy the temple.

name: Jay Schilling's Edge of Chaos
description: A text adventure mystery with a modern parser.

name: Crazy World
description: Open-world life simulation RPG. Non-linear story, you decide who to join and who to fight. You can become anything you want to be, from a criminal to a businessman. Procedurally generated open World.

name: Chicken Empire: Weasel in Shadows
description: Turn-based stealth strategy game, where you try to infiltrate the Chicken Empire bases looking for clues that will help find your friend, the Frog who has been missing since the last chicken raid. Throughout your journey, you will uncover many secrets, and maybe even more than you wanted to know!

name: Taoist Priest Yan
description: Taoist Priest Yan is a 3D RPG game. Players will play a famous Exorcist. There are many tombs in this forest. Darkness gives birth to many demons and ghosts. They haunt at night, lure and kill pedestrians and eat their blood and body. Yan Chixia heard about it and came here to destroy them.

name: Concerto on White
description: Rhythm Action? No, this is MUSICIAN SIMULATION!

name: Neura Mechanicus
description: Neura Mechanicus is a turn-based squad tactics game where you operate robot squads in tournaments, each with unique abilities, upgrades and different game mechanics. Enter a cyberpunk world full of strange homemade robots and challenging teams vying to be the best at tournaments.

name: Food Poppers
description: A Cutely drawn clicker game.

name: East Trapper
description: A 2D adventure game with traps to keep you on your toes.

name: Can You Escape
description: A physics based puzzle, clicker & small automation game. Figure out how to escape, because no-one is coming to help you...

name: Irongate Arena
description: Build a formidable team of fighters, healers, and magical warriors while battling your way from village to village in turn based combat. Command your men and take vengeance on those who murdered your father, uphold his legacy, and slay your way to glory!

name: Solitarius
description: Solitarius is a 2D top-down wave shooter set in a sci-fi space environment.

name: Castlepoint
description: Castlepoint, an immersive fantasy & medieval strategy game similar to chess and old-style action-based real time strategy games. Conquer enemy areas, without allowing them to enter yours!

name: Socialize
description: If you're a fan of Altis life, DarkRP, GTAV RP and more, Socialize is the multiplayer role-playing game you've been waiting for! Join a unique community that will fit your vision of roleplaying in this endless living world and write your own story with no limits!

name: Solar Cage
description: You have one job: BLOW UP THE SUN. A game perfect for parkour/shooter fans, speedrunners, and those looking for an extra challenging experience!

name: Stillborn Slayer
description: Stillborn Slayer is a beautifully crafted pixel-art bullet hell RPG game set in a cursed Dark Continent, with challenging boss fights, exploration, and complex combat. Master dodging and rolling skills to fight incomprehensible monsters and slay the Horned God to end the Curse.

name: Please Duology
description: A compilation of two slow-paced, cosmic horror walking simulators, to be completed in under an hour. Please makes you maintain a power station and ignore the noises from the main engine, while Please Follow has you explore the trenches of a losing war, exposing your mind to visions of another world.

name: Syncope
description: Syncope is a metroidvania with an intricate plot that will immerse you in an adventurous journey through a fascinating world.

name: Near Site
description: Near Site is a survival horror game where you are severely near sighted. Over come your visual handicap, solve puzzles, gather clues, and evade predators as you adventure the wilds.

name: Feyght
description: A Small Village Builder / Survival Game. Your villages are under attack! Collect resources, build up towns, defences and prepare small armies to survive.

name: Sky Harrier: Alpha Code
description: Single player on rails shooter featuring aerial combat, nostalgic nods to classic arcade shmups, synthwave inspired aesthetics and a vibe to take you straight to the 1980s.

name: Experiment of Being
description: Escape the room game with a story

name: Triclinium
description: Triclinium is a small comedy visual novel about a girl out of space who just wanted to eat.

name: Dream Storm
description: FPS Multiplayer Team Deathmatch game.

name: ShapeGrid
description: Shapegrid is a casual puzzle game. Find your way through different shapes and colors. Play 70+ levels or compete against other players in endless mode.

name: Before the Night
description: "What do rabbits eat at night?" Before The Night is a horror action adventure. Try to survive in a small and cute animal village! At night, animal friends turn into crazy monsters! Join the cute pet Lisa's journey!

name: Blipz
description: Blipz is a unique and addictive arcade puzzler that serves as a tribute to the main design mechanic of Tetris, creating order from chaos.

name: Wonky Works!
description: Unite the fellas and fight for freedom!

name: GhostHunter
description: Ghost Hunter is a cartoon style party game. You can play it with your local and online friends. Use your SpiritGun to eliminate ghost and disturb your adversary.

name: Spirits of Carter Mansion
description: Oh no! You've just kicked your favourite ball into the gigantic abandoned manor across the street! In a moment of bravery you venture inside to retrieve and journey around the house, uncovering its twisted halls, and sinister secrets whilst trying to escape with your beloved prize!

name: Russian Train Trip
