description: Traveling on passenger trains in Russia. First-person exploration.

name: Era of Combat: Boxing
description: Era of Combat: Boxing is a multiplayer VR experience that strives to reward physical and martial prowess. Grab a friend, or a complete stranger, and face-off for a heart-pumping, head-thumping good time! Make 'em sweat!

name: Tale of Serendipity
description: A game of suspense and adventure, where you will take the role of Carla in search of her feline lost by a seemingly harmless people

name: Space Tek
description: Space Tek, Command, Construct, Collect!Space Tek is an exciting free to play online starship combat game. Players build their dream ships out of a range of unique blocks, and tailor their ships. Then put the ships to the test alongside or against players and Ai in a multitude of gamemodes!

name: Witherholme
description: Witherholme is a co-op (1-4 player) survival horror game where players take on the role of a young goblin magi. Scavenge for clues, discover new spells, and use your trusty staff to light the way through a cursed village.

name: Where Stars Belong
description: A short narrative exploration game where you become a Neural Diver Assistant somewhere in the furure. Explore the depth of a corrupted mind by patient S02, talk to thoughts to get hints about the patients life and solve mental puzzles. Uncover the hidden truth layer by layer.

name: My Cashy Side Job at Lost&Found in the Subway of Million-Person City
description: Noir adventure for an unlucky subway's lost and found worker!

name: Graffiti Cozy
description: Graffiti Cozy - open-world 3D-platformer where you can explore city with jetpack, bomb graffiti spots and chill out with bouncy hip-hop soundtrack - and all of that at toy-like smooth vibes.

name: Mastodonte
description: Mastodonte is an innovative Shoot 'Em Up with the unique mechanics of swapping the view from Vertical to Horizontal scrolling. Sometimes optional, sometimes necessary, but it creates a new experience for each retry.

name: Potato Party: The Potatomancer
description: Potato Party: The Potatomancer is a competitive party platformer in which potatoes in mech suits compete in an array of head-to-head arena challenges to crown a victor, who can turn the laws of nature against their opponents. Try the beta!

name: Bomberpet
description: Bomberpet is a game about bombers who like to blow up everything in their way. Blow up, collect power-ups and win.

name: Natural
description: Very beautiful game of natural jigsaw puzzle game! Collect the full image of the different small pieces. You can either play with very relaxing on Casual mode, Customize mode or Challenge Mode. Support unique game modes like Rotation, Limited Pick, Blind, Black Hole, Color Layer, and so on.

name: Highblast
description: Highblast is a parkour fps game with some unique features like slow motion, low gravity, a jetpack and a grappling hook. Your goal is to destroy the evil enemy robots and escape the levels.

name: Dyflexion
description: Journey through space to save Earth from evil inter-dimensional beings and their anunnaki serpents in this sci-fi vertical scroll shooter where deflecting enemy projectiles is key to success.

name: Vividerie
description: Run, shoot, dash and magic your way through hordes of vile creatures in various procedurally generated dungeons. Combine items in countless ways and master each character – all while discovering secret places and finding out more about the enchanted world of Vividerie.

name: Showbiz Tycoon
description: Own a movie studio, negotiate with talents, schedule releases, make money, expand your business and become the biggest in the industry.

name: Jaws & Claws
description: Jaws & Claws combines elements of platformer, beat'em up, fighter, gunfires, sports competiotions and adventures in a world full of crazy creatures. Waste no time and jump in the fire to the sounds of hard'n'heavy.

name: Spoockey
description: Who cares about Christmas! We wanted Halloween all year long, so we made Spoockey, a competitive multiplayer air hockey/block break mashup to satisfy your creepy cravings

name: Little Island
description: Little Island offers you the experience of interacting with a variety of cute animals in a VR space. Dive into a world full of nature and adorable animal children. You will be healed by interacting with the lively animals. Help them in their time of need, play with them, and love them.

name: Citrus Rampage
description: Call up your buddies and enjoy the acidic chaos of Citrus Rampage, a physics-based multiplayer shooter with silly guns and destructible environments. Play with up to 4 players in local multiplayer or online using Steam Remote Play Together.

name: Cheeky Princess
description: Princess Ida is a proud student of the Royal Academy of Heroes but her father returned from the war and decided to arrange his daughter's personal life. How will his gamble turn out?

name: Ukiyo
description: Ukiyo is a story-based adventure game set in cyberspace. You control the main character Kai, a samurai cat, as he explores the cyberspace. Enjoy a unique world that combines Japanese art style and cyberpunk.

name: Mondealy
description: Mondealy is about you building relationships and exploring the world. An ordinary guy from an ordinary town on an ordinary day uncovers the secrets of an extraordinary underground kingdom located under his home. Your adventure begins!

name: New Terra
description: New Terra is a challenging and addictive multi-directional gravity-based space shooter. Fuel goes fast and is hard to come by. Hauling cargo makes your ship very heavy and mobility becomes limited. Strategy and resource conservation is key to completing your missions or you won't survive.

name: Don't Kill the King!
description: Play as a medieval guard who has to interrogate visitors and search them for potential contraband. Allow the visitors into the city, or throw them into the dungeon. The choice is yours. But be careful, any one of the visitors could be disguised as the assassin and try to take the king's life, again.

name: Suber Driver
description: Complete different driving missions as a taxi or private taxi driver and pick your favorite car from a selection of over 15 amazing vehicles, with tons of customizations.

name: Kingdom Traveler
description: A survival exploration game where you can explore islands, challenge various monsters and defeat powerful Bosses. Craft various weapons and items, place items, grow vegetables and fruits, and trade with merchants. Set sail in the harbor, encounter pirates, monsters and random events in the sea.

name: Chimes
description: Chimes is a silly PvP game with a fully controllable character and goofy Ragdoll physics.

name: IllusionCircle
description: IllusionCircle is a unique and very interesting game, and you will be deeply shocked by it.Make you believe that the world is not real. You will find it very difficult to get a higher score. You need to challenge your limits.It's a good choice to give it as a gift to your friends this Christmas.

name: Master Forge
description: You own a smithy and the land around it. Gather resources outside or buy them when the trader visits and craft products to sell to customers. Some will have special requests for you, which will allow you to earn more money and also fame. Enough fame will make customers pay more money.

name: We are Blacksmith
description: 'We are Blacksmith' is action game created dot image. Became the blacksmith, and adventure the cave, mine the materials, battle to monsters. Cast the products and the weapons, the protectors. And sell to created items.

name: Momo's Mansion
description: Fun and cute RPG about a loveable cat named MOMO who goes on a epic adventure. Family friendly content for all ages. DID WE MENTION CATS!?!?

name: Traveler Bird
description: An adventurous bird that travels to different places.

name: Necrotopia
description: Necrotopia is an exploratory action game, in which a monster, who woke up on a stormy night by lightning, picks up junks as weapons and searches for who he/she is. Use various types of weapons to defeat enemies and explore the fascinating world.

name: Halloween Night
description: You play the role of Henry as a child and experience the terror that befell him 20 years earlier on Halloween. The game consists of 4 chapters, each of them is a separate day in the life of a 6-year-old henry. Will you end the game with a Good or Bad Ending? It Depends On You.

name: Ooze Redux
description: A NES hard game, made to run and play on original hardware. Ported to the PC. 7 hard and unique levels. An original gripping ChipTune sound track! 8 bit glory in this side scrolling shooter platformer!

name: Umille
description: Un prototipo, un idea di quello che potrebbe essere un RPG classico con le meccaniche di un Souls-like. Questo gioco si concentra soprattutto sulla storia che viene narrata in poche righe di dialogo e sta al giocatore capire come stanno le cose...

name: Shattered Gardens
description: Shattered Gardens is the all-new Open-World, Fantasy RPG!

name: Crazy Truck
description: Become the king of the road - a truck driver who delivers important cargo! Crazy Truck gives you a very realistic truck driving experience! Deliver heavy oil tanks and other cargo. Put your skills, stamina and speed to the test.

name: Semiconductor
description: A tactical platformer about the near future, powerful organizations, military concerns, and accident.

name: LTO Arcade
description: Blast Off with LTO Arcade! LTO Arcade puts you straight into the action! From our fast-paced arena mode inspired by the classic "Asteroids" game, to the intellectual struggle of "Minesweeper" - LTO Arcade is the perfect fall-back for any quick gaming urge!

name: Her Jentle Hi-ness
description: A fast-paced visual novel game where you must survive the whims of a mad queen, with a unique combination of classic art scenes and cartoon people

name: Rouge Patrol
description: A harrowing exploration of the gun-girl trope that doesn't look away once the trigger has been pulled. In this fully-voiced visual novel/ stat raiser you will lead a unit of child soldiers into a deadly war of attrition where your every choice carries the weight of their survival.

name: Obama Boss Fight
description: In the world where all answers were told the great enemies confronted each other. The time has come. Time to defeat Obama once and for all. Will the world be free from racism or you will start a new era? It is up to you. But keep in mind... Obama has no chill.

name: Overbowed
description: Explore a kingdom overrun by evil magic as you fight foes with your own magical bow.

name: Sneezeman: Return to Planet Sneeze
description: Introducing a new type of hero for the pandemic age! Platforming fun with hand drawn graphics from irreverent comedic powerhouse 'Modern Toss'! Avoid the chaotic sneeze cloud, out manoeuvre goose-stepping bad guys and navigate giant virus spores. Can you Escape from Planet Sneeze?!

name: Zenteni
description: Build, conquer and collect puzzles.

name: Falconet
description: Falconet is a retro-style twin stick shooter with smooth weapon switching and quick reaction gameplay. Travel through unique levels, solve puzzles, and use your diverse arsenal of weapons to efficiently eliminate an army of rogue machines, rescue human survivors, and rack up high scores.

name: Luna: Supernatural Hunter
description: In Luna: Supernatural Hunter use your guns in an addictive bullet hell top-down shooter, accompanied by your cat Joe, who has healing powers, to exterminate all the monsters that are attacking the village.

name: Doomer
description: Try on the role of a Russian Doomer, who lives in a typical post-Soviet building. Your pointless life filled with routine and addictions. Can you cope with it?

name: Adventure Fitness VR
description: Challenge yourself on this VR fitness game! Run, climb, and zipline through a diverse set of environment using arm swing controls and then get through high intensity workout stations ranging from battle ropes, archery, boxing, and more. It's a bit like running a VR triathlon.

name: Chesskoban Bishop
description: Relaxing puzzle game for chess lovers and beginners using a combination of sokoban and chess mechanics. Capture enemy bishops to complete levels.

name: Palphone-Sama: Curse Call
description: All of the Twitter accounts and Websites in the game exist in reality. Use your Internet browser to gather information and uncover hidden secrets, and get to the bottom of the urban legend surrounding the popular calling and live streaming App "Palphone"!

name: Full Metal Sergeant
description: You are a drill instructor, you have 12 weeks to turn a herd of dumb conscripts into war machines. Set their planning, upgrade your bootcamp and make sure the recruits don't kill themselves. Sir, Yes Sir!

name: Ekoh Beach
description: Ekoh Beach is where you spent the best vacations of your childhood: golden sandy beaches, awesome arcades, zen tranquility and friendly faces. You have answered the call to return to Ekoh Beach once again and return its former glory with your building skills.

name: Marmoset
description: In a world ravaged by World War III, a group of survivors found safety at the top of the trees, only without the resources of the caves the city of Marmoset will not have a future, however you can change that.

name: Nailed It
description: Nailed It is a VR puzzle game. You will make a path to your agent to reach its target.

name: Tzakol in Exile
description: Turn-based roguelite with procedural generation. You can choose an adventure for a short run or for a long exploration.

name: Catherine Ragnor and the Legend of the Flying Dutchman
description: After falling victim to a curse, Captain Hendrick van der Decken of the Flying Dutchman is doomed to sail the seas for eternity. However, a chance encounter with another cursed pirate shows him a chance to find salvation. Play this thrilling Match3 adventure and help Captain van Decken.

name: VR Sky Walk
description: "VR Sky Walk" is a simple VR immersive game that opens a different door for you who love thrills.

name: Grey Heritage: Faded Vision
description: Command a rebellion as Leon Beaumont, Exiled Prince of Astrea, against the king that betrayed him. Engage in a classic turn-based tactical RPG experience as you unravel untold secrets from the past. Recruit allies, manage inventory, and train your soldiers in this JRPG inspired journey!

name: Funny Panda
description: If you love challenging platformers, then don't pass up this great game. In Funny Panda you have to play as a very funny panda who loves to run, jump and overcome the most difficult traps and obstacles on the way !!!

name: Gangsta: The Return
description: Gangsta series will return. Now you are super gangsta soldier and need find captured virus. Use different weapons and magical skills to destroy enormous evil army

name: Through the World
description: Great Arcade with runner and clicker elements. There are unforgettable adventures waiting for you with many collapsing barriers and more. Get points for destroying barriers, update your health, increase the stock of spheres and open new worlds forward.

name: Ice sugar
description: Ice sugar is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level. 100 levels. 5 musical compositions. Varied bonus.

name: Ani Leaving Sirius
description: A dying planet in energy chaos, dangerous districts and challenging combats. Your only chance to escape the planet is through inconsistent portal! Gain energy crystals by slaying enemies. Improve your abilities and acquire drones. Complete your escape quest in this challenging rouge-lite gameplay.

name: The Grave robber
description: The grave robber is a role play / action adventure / puzzle solving game, which tells the story of the treasure hunt for Cao Cao.

name: Rebirth-Land of Zombies
description: This is a zombie shooting game, you can experience high-precision guns, grenades, and real environmental effects

name: Bionic Shield: Battle for Space Nebula Omega
description: In this 2D twin-stick shooter you fly your spaceship, fight in epic space battles, discover new planets, invade new terrain, avoid traps, dodge bullets, customize your weapons and shoot your way through hordes of enemies. A different experience every time you play.

name: The House Before
description: A narrative adventure game where you play as a house filled with strange creatures.

name: Dungeon's Fall
description: Face the hardest and longest Dungeon ever made. Use power-ups, to increase difficulty or make it easier.

name: Crops and Conveyors
description: Crops and Conveyors is a cozy game about building an automated farm. Enjoy the satisfying progression of starting from scratch, gathering resources, earning money and growing your farm.

name: Balls and Dungeons
description: Challenging spatial puzzle platformer. Open walls and put the balls in the holes. Requires logic and tactics to complete. Lots of levels with increasing complexity. Relaxing and ambient gameplay. How deep can you get?

name: Unko Typing
description: "UNKO Typing" is a simple typing practice game. Players need to type words related to "Japanese UNKO" as quickly and accurately as possible. Even those who are not good at typing can enjoy typing while being healed by "Japanese UNKO" in this game.

name: Seventh Angel
description: Seventh Angel is a surreal psychological first person horror game of a man on the brink of absolute madness. Questioning the veracity of blurred memories and hallucinations, and discovering the lies within himself. Stunning graphics, intense action and masterful storytelling. Experience the madness.

name: Bingiman: Trap Ochido
description: BINGIMAN: Trap Ochido is a fast paced , boomer shooter inspired video game with a sinister African aesthetic feel through its voodoo and gunplay art direction.

name: Jump10000
description: Jump and collect coins to upgrade your slime's jumping power! If the jumping power increases, you will be able to collect more and more coins! Remember! Your goal is to reach 100 floor!

name: Timothy: Shinpi no Mori
description: Sin descripción

name: Bauer
description: Bauer is a side-scrolling fun little arcade game where you help a simple mouse fly his plane and avoid all the obstacles in the air.

name: Kukumushi Virtual Pet
description: Adopt and care for your Kukumushi, watching them grow and evolve. Feed, clean and play with your virtual pets!

name: Floor is...What!?
description: Floor is...What!? doesn't just mean floor is lava! Experience 4 player mini game mayhem with 50+ games set in a snow filled frozen tundra, hungry shark infested waters, low gravity moon base, and more while customizing your characters with over 100 unlockable costumes!

name: Faye Falling
description: Explore purgatory as you discover who you are and how you died, in this heartfelt RPG.

name: Consume Thy Flesh: The Pumpkin Smashing Sim
description: A bite-sized physics based Halloween hootenanny! Players must roll their gargantuan gourd to blood-thirsty rug-rats below, so they may dine on your candy packed insides. Maintain momentum, catch some sick air, and splatter your insides all over. The ravenous spirits of Samhain must be satiated.

name: The Paribneur Combination
description: Make your way through the abandoned establishment of Paribneur Co. As you discover the hidden secrets and horrifying creatures of the building. Being forced to find a new way out of the building, you will face hard choices, choose carefully, your choices will affect the rest of the game...

name: Demons Roots
description:
The demons, sealed away in the realm of darkness for a thousand years, now face extinction.
Their final battle with the humans is set to begin on a cursed ground of tragedy and slavery...

name: Baptism of Fire
description: What at first was just another ranger duty, becomes the duty of champions trusted to protect the whole country's safety. In a race against time and against the former Champion Jorgen, Zasker and his party must secure all three Volgaia Shards to save the country from total ruin.

name: Alchera
description: Alchera A Struggle for Life steward in an alternate universe, sees a portal at the end of the cave during an operation, wondering and approaching the steward. He enters the portal and finds himself in an age where god and his soldiers rule the earth, his goal is to find the portal and save himself.

name: Everdine: A Lost Girl's Tale
description: Everdine finds herself lost in a forest of eternal twilight. Help her gather the needed ingredients to perform a magic ritual to escape before the dangers of these woods devour poor Everdine. ~ An atmospheric, fairy tale vibes RPG Maker horror adventure.

name: Cattails: Wildwood Story
description: Lead your colony of cats into the mysterious Wildwood. Stalk prey to find food, defend your new home from dark intruders, and discover fresh herbs & ancient treasures. Build a thriving town for all cats to call home. Get to know the residents, fall in love, and raise a litter of kittens!

name: Sniperpunk
description: Sniperpunk is an epic arena shooter where every bullet ricochets. Duel players online or locally in high-octane casual or ranked 1v1 matches. Outplay opponents with 4 punk-themed characters, each with unique weapons and abilities. And it's free! Bring your friends and ricochet your way to victory!

name: Play Outside Simulator
description: Play Outside is a game in which you can do your favorite activities ... on your PC! (without really going outside).

name: Project Delta
description: Explore all possible realities as you try and save the multiverse from the Darkness in this unique Procedural Meta-Metroidlike Adventure.

name: Crow Story
description: Jump, dive, and platform through this minimalistic indie 3D platformer about a little crow trying to save his friends.

name: You Are A Pilot
description: You Are A Pilot is a 2D arcade simulator of a pilot who drives jet-powered flying car. The controls are based on physics. Deliver various goods, drive livestock on a farm, or defend the earth from alien invaders.

name: Celestial Project
description: "Celestial Project" is a Roguelike WarChess game. It is the first game of the story "Celestial". Command the special operations forces, resist and study unknown alien creatures from space, defend the five star ship civilization spacecraft under construction on earth, and retain human kindling!

name: Sokobot
description: Sokobot is an open-ended puzzle game where you place down cute robots, give them commands, and create infinitely-looping assembly lines that combine shapes together!

name: The Flea Evolution: Bugaboo
description: Relive The Flea or experience it for the first time in The Flea Evolution, a skill and ingenuity game where you have to guide the flea through a maze of intricate caverns. Your mission is to find the exit jumping between the different platforms, but be careful not to get eaten by the enemies!

name: The Tale of Fighting Nymphs
description: The fighting game looks like anime style.

name: Wordle 5
description: Wordle 5 is the culmination of the Wordle series with brand new puzzles 10 new categories, 500 puzzles

name: Atelier Agnes
description: Agnes, a girl living will her ill sister, meets her master of alchemy, Bell Faris for the first time in 7 years. She makes up her mind to become a mature alchemist when Bell indicates about the recovery of her sister. But Bell was planning to utilize Agnes's kind character to repay her debt...

name: Sprocket Wings
description: In this fast-paced 3D racing game, you’ll go wing to wing against a motley band of Gnomelings. After zigzagging through 16 trippy courses, you’ll wonder: Is it a race with a twist or a twisted rave? Either way, expect a potent dose of disorienting visuals and disturbing surprises at every turn.

name: Spruce
description: Create the perfect community for your town of wizards. Forge weapons and defensive towers in preparation for the onslaught of monsters - and pray you survive.

name: Sanya
description: 2D narrative adventure game about the warmth of fleeting childhood memories: about a little boy named Sanya, his dog, his friends and many exciting adventures that await them in a small post-soviet Russian town set in the achingly strange and nostalgic period of the 90s.

name: The Defaloon
description: The Defaloon - this is a single-player game made in an abstract 2.5-day schedule. The essence of the gameplay is to clear the level of enemies with a large number of different weapons, such as magic or spells.

name: Enraged
description: Deck the halls with bullets and elf-matter in this high-octane 2D melee-shooter where you embark on a mission to put an end to Santa's sweatshop

name: Commuter
description: Commuter is a top-down 2D pixel art driving game inspired by old-school arcade games.

name: Nios
description: NIOS is a futuristic anti gravity obstacle racing game arcade where you run along a point to point paths in a open world map. Get your best score overtaking the greatest number of opponents in sequences without hit them. P.S. Remember to follow the green arrow otherwise you could get lost. :-)

name: Ring of Titans
description: Ring of Titans is a modern take on the small scale fast paced team combat arena genre. Queue up to play 1v1, 2v2, or 3v3, the first team to eliminate everyone from the other team wins. No grinding, no pay to win, just queue and play.

name: A Christmas Story From Hell VR
description: CHOKE ON A GAS STATION HOT DOG. GET SENT TO HELL. MAKE A DEAL WITH ST PETER. RIP AND TEAR HORDES OF DEMONIC PRESENTS IN ETERNAL DAMNATION. DEFEAT LUCIFER HIMSELF. Enjoy your Christmas. . . IN HELL.

name: Goomanuvr
description: In this hilarious and challenging platformer, swing and jump your way though the harsh depths of a Child's Toy Room, the relaxing heat of the Beach, the zaniness of a Carnival, and the extravagance of the Disco! Put your skills to the test in Single or Multiplayer.

name: Kill The Monster Z
description: Kill The Monster Z is a pixel-style, side-scrolling action game where you play The role of The main character, trying to destroy what you see as enemies, but it's not that easy.

name: The Dragon and the Djinn
description: Make a wish! Can your djinn help you save the city from a dragon, or will you befriend the dragon and learn its secrets?

name: Empires of the Void II
description: A sci-fi turn-based strategy game. A faithful digital rendition of the beloved board game, Empires of the Void II.

name: Little Sparks
description: A puzzle game about fireflies

name: Lingo
description: Lingo is a first person word puzzle game with a large, abstract world to explore. With its epiphany-driven gameplay and impossible geometry, Lingo provides a unique and nonlinear experience.

name: Space Waves
description: Space Waves is a procedurally generated 2D arcade style shooter with multiple collectable power ups and varying enemy types. This game will casually draw you in and then increase the pace and difficulty as you progress through the never ending levels.

name: This is Timmy
description: While searching for his own path, home service robot Timmy finds himself trapped. Face deadly and challenging puzzles to find your way to freedom.

name: Zarktor's Realm
description: Zarktor's Realm is a beautiful open-world RPG adventure inspired by Skyrim. Explore medieval England on horseback, uncover Arthurian legends, battle hordes of undead, gather and upgrade.

name: Gun to Colonists
description: An epic platform fighter for up to 4 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room

name: Whiskey Bravo
description: A sci-fi strategy board game, where nerdy dice rolls determine the outcome of battle. Command your Spider Cannon and zany troops in a turn-based tactics game that plays like a cross between Advance Wars and Warhammer.

name: Aplestia: Retold
description: Follow the steps of Britton, Summer, Sover and Marina, a team of four rookie adventurers that went on their first ever S Class Quest! Aplestia:Retold is the remade version of the 2017 game and offers double the content, more side quests, stages and much much more!

name: Oftalmogarden
description: Oftalmogarden is a fast and chaotic roguelike sci-fi eyeball monster shooting game. Shoot your way through hordes of enemies, collect upgrades, weapons, and gadgets to grow stronger, but accumulate curses over time. Speed is your best ally to survive, the sky is watching and death will not wait.

name: Kingdom's Life
description: Kingdom's Life - Large turn-based global strategy game in pixel style. You have to create your own people and state. Can you lead the state to political, economic, technological and military triumph? It depends on you.

name: MMA Championship
description: MMA Championship is a mixed martial arts fighting game

name: TripSync
description: A machine-learning utilizing application for immersing in a bundle of multi-world diverting storylines of random interesting scenarios in which the characters are vocally interactable.

name: Spookware: Watch Party
description: A collection of spooky microgames featuring fast-paced gameplay inspired by horror classics. Chop off legs, hurl hatchets, clash cards with Nosferatu, and many other ghoulish acts of terror!

name: Ballad of Ba'al
description: An atmospheric tabletop, turn-based strategy roguelike about passing trials of the afterlife and ascending from eternal purgatory. Endure your depraved company through grim sacrifices, cryptic riddles, and oblivion’s ever-changing labyrinth all through an interpretive, minimalistic style.

name: George: A Horror Story
description: While out on a relaxing hike in the woods, George loses his bearing and finds himself lost in the mountains. He now has one goal. Finding a way back to civilization and safety, and escaping the dangers of these lands.

name: Three Dimension
description: Is your life normal?Explore the world with three protagonists and uncover the hidden secrets of this ordinary yet unusual world!

name: BallRoll
description: Experience metaphorical descent into the land of darkness and then back to the light.

name: Froggerty Arcade 2
description: The hop is on. More classic arcade froggy goodness from Tudou Games.

name: Hard Glide
description: This is an arcade-style inertial skill-shooter with mouse control only.

name: Robert Robie and the Idols of Jade
description: Hilarious adventure game in cartoon style. Robert Robie receives a mysterious assignment while hiding from the police in a cheap motel in Mexico.

name: Mistake
description: According to the assurances of scientists, the probability of an on-board computer error is only 0.0001%, but we should have pulled out this lucky ticket!

name: Apocalyptic Vibes
description: An immersive retro first-person shooter on GZDoom. You are a lone wanderer walking through the endless wasteland. Your destination is vague... Search the ruins of a dead civilization, get into gunfights, survive in severe post-apocalyptic weather. And find the meaning along the way.

name: Missing Mildred
description: A 2D platformer game with puzzle elements in a retro NES/SNES style. The story is about finding a missing cat named Mildred.

name: Imitating Zombies
description: Imitating Zombies is a game where you have to play the role of a zombie, go through the path, eating brains and dodging boomerangs. Only the road is not so smooth, and banging your head takes your life. Balancing and running the entire route, go through all the levels and reach the goal.

name: Ailuri
description: A hand-drawn, 2D platformer following the breathtaking story of an endangered red panda, named Ailuri. Climb, explore and survive the intricate levels while trying to defeat enemies to restore balance of life in the world.

name: Absentis
description: Adventure game with RPG elements in which you have to take on the role of a young and ambitious traveler named Jack, for whom a trip to a frightening, but alluring island with its secrets turned out to have completely unexpected consequences.

name: Crystal Venture
description: Crystal Venture is a voxel based adventure game with a focus on exploration and survival. The whole world around you is uniquely generated and fully editable. Build impressive castles, fight monsters, or go through quests, the game fits many gaming styles, is moddable and multiplayer.

name: Memory Grove
description: A mood journal come to life. Record your thoughts and feelings each day and watch as the library of your memories grows more popular and your garden grows more verdant.

name: Last Group Out
description: Shoot, loot and try to escape with your life in this online co-op looter shooter!

name: Split Drive
description: Split Drive is a roguelite arena shooter where you have to find your way home through a hostile galaxy, numerous locations and a variety of bosses, all generated procedurally.

name: Ending Way
description: Chapter 2 is now here waiting for you. With horrible creatures and things you can do to get out. But ... beware of Adi

name: Spin City
description: "Spin City" is a simulator of an elite casino full of secrets, where you can fully plunge in the world of excitement and try your luck, enjoying the elegant neon design. Make risky bets, feel free to spin the roulette wheel and win in real time!

name: NeoLemmix
description: NeoLemmix is a modernised clone of the early-90s video game Lemmings. Its history begins with EricLang's "Lemmix", also a Lemmings clone, which sought to replicate the gameplay physics of the DOS version of Lemmings perfectly, while adding features like framestepping, saveable replays and Windows compatibility. Whereas Lemmix's goal was accurate reproduction, NeoLemmix - which began as a fork of Lemmix by namida - had the goal of removing all the glitches, increasing user-friendliness, and simplifying the use of fan-made content. Eventually, it also introduced many new gameplay features. These days, NeoLemmix is considered a completely distinct engine from Lemmix, which is once again being developed by namida.

name: Fey: Distant Daydream
description: An old mansion, a mysterious letter, a box of old memorabilia. Explore the present and past to uncover the secrets of the extraordinary family that lived here. Remember a time long gone as you set foot in this late 1990s-inspired mystery with intricate puzzles and eccentric characters.

name: Metal Hunter
description: Top-down 3D shoot 'em up game in which you play as a robot that fights for survival against other robots. Your only goal is to kill all your enemies until you are the last one standing.

name: Plinko Panic!
description: Plinko Panic! is a roguelike 'board-builder' about using a set of pinballs and a pachinko board in order to delve through dungeons and defeat numerous enemies. Buy a new pinball at the end of each round and see just how far you can get!

name: Bad Way
description: Bad Way is an action adventure game in the style of TPS.History professor Michael Wayne hadn't yet realised the trouble he was getting into when he got the call. This unexpected trouble that he didn't plan at all would drag him into an adventure that he could never imagine.

name: Sunny Beach
description: Plunge into the summer atmosphere with the game Sunny Beach!

name: Violent Agent
description: Violent Agent - Top Down Shooter, where you play as a secret agent. You need to get rid of enemies and return the money to the company. Gather all your will into a fist and passing level after level, using a knife and a machine gun, destroy everyone in your path.

name: The Dawn: Sniper's Way
description: The industrial city "Seversk" was abandoned after the 1981 flood, which led to a number of irreversible consequences at the nuclear power plant and research laboratories. Play as mercenaries, unite, act in your own or common interests.

name: Life in the Machine
description: A detective game, which involves investigating a crime scene.

name: Death in the Family
description: "Death in the family" is a horror game about how the dead can confuse, frighten and even kill those they don't like.

name: Ninja Soul
description: Ninjasoul is a platform action game that combines roguelite with Galaxy warrior demon city. Kunoichi, Tachibana Yachiyo unexpectedly awakened the ability of "death backtracking". She will find the truth in the land that used to be her hometown in the fight and death again and again.

name: Fire in the Beastlands
description: An old-school 2D sidescrolling action RPG soulslike metroidvania influenced by the greats of the past!

name: Emiko's Pledge
description: Emiko's Pledge is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of a Half Demon girl called Emiko, whose mission is to fulfill her dream of becoming the best warrior in the Demon world and also, to protect the Ettaze state from the enemies who infiltrated into the territory.
